label: uncl7459
comment: Code specifying a category of attendee.

values.label: Same-day patient with overnight stay
values.comment: Actual or intended arrangement for same-day procedure with overnight stay.

values.label: Same-day patient without overnight stay
values.comment: Actual or intended arrangement for same-day procedure without overnight stay.

values.label: Non same-day patient with overnight stay
values.comment: Actual or intended arrangement for procedure, other than a same-day procedure, involving overnight stay.

values.label: Outreach clinic visit
values.comment: Visit to an outreach clinical facility.

values.label: Home care visit
values.comment: Provision of care to the patient in the patient's home.
